*as more and more data come to us and less less time remain to us*

*effectively visualise those data become crucial*

*that is where data visualisation finds its mission*

data visualisation is a young discipline, but it roots its origins into a glorious past: painting, design, technical design, theory of colors and statistics.

That is why our young lady is so promising and every one is looking at here. Will she be able to meet this high expetations? 
Some dangerous enemies are coming to the assault, calling her useles consultants crap or making her up with horrible colours and ugly pie charts.

I start from here my help to rescue her, and defend her place into businesses, academics and the age of information.
